channel.title: Emote name doesnt appear
channel.description:
Ok i put in the correct things for to make a emote int he emote animation and i was making some for my skillcapes apparently the name in the box doesnt show up i put it in as "cape"
heres the code of it
[img]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p201/Nickcar232/RAEWW.jpg[/img]
the code in action
[img]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p201/Nickcar232/rrrarrgghhh.jpg[/img]
the emote and everything is working fine its just the name i put in didnt show up when i started putting in the name in client .java i started looking for @blu@char and i thought thats how the name shows up look i put it right here right under update () [img]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p201/Nickcar232/RAWR.jpg[/img]
image shown right there i tried that and it didnt work
can someone help me on this its been and month and i cant seem to figure it out

item.title: Emote name doesnt appear
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

If im using a devolution 7.0 server an i want to change emote names what would i search and put that under?

Read full topic

item.title: Emote name doesnt appear
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:5, topic:175076”]veki is wrong you dont need the

sendFrame126("@red@cape",165);

at all. just use what i just gave you, it will help you out with the first 12 emotes.[/quote]
Orly?-.-,he didn’t know where to put it so I told him just place it under that.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote name doesnt appear

item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

If you didn’t have any of this what would you add it under in client.java?

Btw im’ using a devolution 7.0 server source.

All help is appreciated.

Thanx!

item.title: Emote name doesnt appear
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

Just add like this

sendFrame126("@red@cape",177);

under this

sendFrame126("@red@cape",165);

Read full topic

item.title: Emote name doesnt appear
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

i see ur problem ill get to helping u fix it right away m8.

ok see, where yours says

sendFrame126("@red@cape",165);

you need to change the end number to

sendFrame126("@red@cape",177);

u arnt exactly using the emote “case: 165” to declare what the emote tab says.
here to help you out. ill give you the first 12 tabs.

sendFrame126("",180); sendFrame126("",181); sendFrame126("",178); sendFrame126("",175); sendFrame126("",177); sendFrame126("",182); sendFrame126("",185); sendFrame126("",186); sendFrame126("",173); sendFrame126("",179); sendFrame126("",187); sendFrame126("",176);

these are in order on the tab list. like, the first one on my list is the first emote tab on your server. get it?

Read full topic
